title: Transfer Learning Competency Enhancement Program Based on Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic medical knowledge and clinical procedures
context.additional_context: VR simulation education operating in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, featuring task-centered learning design reflecting actual clinical settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply physician-patient communication protocols in complex clinical scenarios with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate a 70% or higher transfer application ability to new clinical situations after practicing full tasks at least three times in a simulation environment.
Learners reduce error rates by 30% when performing two-step complex medical procedures by utilizing cognitive load management strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
